scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently --names ng,nest,apigen --kill-others "npm run start:dev --workspace=client" "npm run start:dev --workspace=server" "nodemon --watch server/src/ --ext ts .utils/api-client-generator-launcher.js online"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=server && npm run build-api-client  && npm run build --workspace=client
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=server && npm run build-api-client && npm run test --workspace=client
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci --workspace=server && npm run build-api-client && npm run test:ci --workspace=client
